channel.title: VPROM LM-1 emulation
channel.description:
Perhaps a naive question: is this EPROM with LM-1 emulation sounds something that could be used together with Axoloti? Just as a chip with ins & outs, separate from its software, I mean. Or maybe with presets stored on the EPROM.
I'd love to use this for some of those 80s sounds.
http://www.alyjameslab.com/alyjameslabvlinn.html

item.title: VPROM LM-1 emulation
item.dc:creator: @janvantomme Jan Vantomme
item.description:
@janvantomme wrote:

That's a VST plugin you are linking to, not a chip.

But Axoloti can indeed be used as a trigger generator/sequencer for chips with drum sounds.

Read full topic
